channel.title: Does ANYONE know how to make monsters apper? =)
channel.description: lol i wanna kill something but i need to know how to make it apper like if im standing by the fountion in varrock, i wanna like a kdb to apper so i can kill... does anyone know how to make a monster apper? (ps, plz dont tell me stuff like go here or there for help, just tell me how!!!)

item.title: Does ANYONE know how to make monsters apper? =)
item.dc:creator: @super_stu super stu
item.description:
@super_stu wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:2, topic:62707”]yes go into autospawn.cfg and then scroll down to the bottom
then add your monster. For example a kbd in varrock would look like this:

spawn = 50 3209 3426 0 0 0 0 0 1 KBD in varrock [/quote]ok where can i find this 'autospawn.cfg???[br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2007, 11:34:24 PM[/size][hr]help?

Read full topic
item.source: Does ANYONE know how to make monsters apper? =)

item.title: Does ANYONE know how to make monsters apper? =)
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

yes go into autospawn.cfg and then scroll down to the bottom
then add your monster. For example a kbd in varrock would look like this:

spawn = 50	3209	3426	0	0	0	0	0	1	KBD in varrock

Read full topic
